fields.label: Style
fields.description: Style for the tabs (e.g., 'default', 'primary')

fields.label: Tab Title
fields.description: Short descriptive title for the tab (e.g., 'Tab 1', 'Getting Started')

fields.description: Allows the video to play automatically

fields.name: video-loop
fields.label: Loop
fields.description: Allows video to replay automatically when finished

fields.label: Muted
fields.description: Allows video to be muted by default

fields.name: video-controls
fields.label: Controls
fields.description: Allows users to control the video playback
